channel.title: Ssiptvs on J2J.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Ssiptvs on J2J.dev

item.title: Help
item.description: Simple Smart IPTV is one of the most popular Smart TV applications in CIS, South America and Europe. SS IPTV has become the first app of LG Smart World, which provided opportunity of IPTV viewing for its users. This app was highly rated by jury of LG Smart TV Apps Contest 2012 and got the prize in the main nomination - The Best App. SS IPTV today is dynamically evolving application, the center of entertainments inside your Smart TV.

item.title: privacy-policy/
item.description: Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy explains how personal data might be collected from users of Simple IPTV - from now on referred to as the app - how they are stored, processed and used by the app. Personal Information The app does not collect, store or share any personally identifiable information about you. Anonymous Usage Information While you are interacting with the app, anonymous information regarding your device might be collected using Google Firebase, in accordance with their Privacy Policy, for the purpose of crash reporting and usage monitoring related to the app.
